title: A Vampire's Touch
description: SiennaOne night on the town changes my life…forever. I can’t give any more detail because that would spoil both the highlights and the low points of my journey. Things are different now, in a way I never dreamed but I am alive, truly alive.JaxI’ve been around for a very long time, experienced change both for the good and bad. I am content but not fulfilled until she walks into my life and everything shifts. I learn the true meaning of love and the bonds that comes with it. When that bond is threatened, I respond. My instincts demand I protect what is mine.A Vampire's Touch(Novelette) is a prequel to the world of The Red Velvet Trilogy
author: Mina J. Moore
